column5: The house is located off 1604 W, close to JBSA Lackland/Medina. Travel time to down town is about 20 minutes. Travel time to sea world is about 10.  We love opening up our home to travelers of all types. We are are a super laid back couple who get along with everyone. I hope you like animals! We have a very social pup and kitty who make up for some good pet therapy for those who are far away from their fur babies.
